content: when 20 stitches remain break yarn leaving an 8 inch tail using a tapestry needle thread the tail trough the live stiches and draw closed secure the tail end of yarn weave in all ends wash and block before attaching optional pom-pom © 2023 sue howlett rev1 2024 knit no stitch ssk k2tog © 2023 sue howlett rev1 2024
